DOC.brief_summary: This prospective observational study will assess the insulin resistance and its impact on sustained virological response in patients with hepatitis C treated with Pegasys and Copegus. Data will be collected from each patient during the up to 72 weeks of treatment and for 24 weeks of treatment-free follow-up.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study on The Impact of Insulin Resistance on Sustained Virological Response in Patients With Hepatitis C Treated With Pegasys (Peginterferon Alfa-2a) and Copegus (Ribavirin)
DOC.criteria: Adult patients, >/= 18 years of age Chronic hepatitis C (detectable HCV RNA) Initiation of treatment with Pegasys and Copegus Participation in a clinical trial during the study
